name: Tales of the rogue
description:
In a Medieval world, a peaceful kingdom was ruled by the terrible and merciless André the Almighty. 

However, his reign needs to stop ! And you're the guy who was asked to take care of him. Enter his castle, eliminate all threats on your path and free your kingdom from his own ruler.

Game developed during the Wonderjam H 2021

Theme :  Resistance

Made by :

Team Naughty Pog ->

Quentin YAHIA

Gabriel OUELLET

Teo MARTIN

Links to the beautiful assets used during this jam :
